entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Visual Cue Audio Player
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Manage your audio libraryÔºö$89.99 ‚Üí $4.99 [$4.99 ~ $89.99]

Application Description

Visual Cue Pro is an advanced, easy-to-use audio player for iOS and iPadOS. Main Features: ‚Ä¢ Waveform view for visual seeking and setting up cue points ‚Ä¢ Zoom functionality for more precise seeking on longer waveforms ‚Ä¢ Caches waveforms for fast display ‚Ä¢ Supports unlimited cue points per file ‚Ä¢ Quickly switch between cue points across multiple audio files ‚Ä¢ Does not alter your precious source files in any way ‚Ä¢ Drag & drop files directly from Files and other apps ‚Ä¢ Designed for speed and efficiency ‚Ä¢ GPU-based waveform renderer ‚Ä¢ Supports Dark Mode Collections: ‚Ä¢ Import files from Files using drag & drop ‚Ä¢ Manage your music library ‚Ä¢ Create cue points within each item Playlists: ‚Ä¢ Import files from Collections using drag & drop (cue points included) ‚Ä¢ Import files from Files using drag & drop (without cue points) ‚Ä¢ Create cue points within each item (shared across playlists if the item is from a Collection) ‚Ä¢ Reorder items using drag & drop in your desired order For Music Producers: ‚Ä¢ Manage your library of reference tracks to compare with your own ‚Ä¢ Quickly jump between cue points in your reference tracks ‚Ä¢ Manage and listen to your own tracks ‚Ä¢ Organize production elements and recorded source material For DJs: ‚Ä¢ Manage your library of tracks ‚Ä¢ Set up cue points in your tracks ‚Ä¢ Compile DJ sets by quickly jumping between cue points in different tracks ‚Ä¢ Manage and listen to your own mixes ‚Ä¢ Bookmark tracks in other DJs‚Äô sets and discover new music faster Visual Cue Pro is an offline music player, music library manager, and music organizer with lossless playback, widely used in sound studios, by music directors, A&R, and for audio transcribing. It's also perfect for venues, theaters, churches, DJs, and more! It features full-screen support, native Apple Silicon support, Dark Mode, and cloud drive compatibility. The best reliable alternative to iTunes, plays audio files and formats supported by macOS, including WAV, AIFF, FLAC, MP3, M4A, and more. Free to download and try. Purchase modules via in-app purchase (subscriptions or lifetime permanent license). If you have a Mac, check out the macOS version too, which offers even more functionality! Privacy Policy: http://visualcueplayer.com/privacy.html Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

entry.title: Guitar Gravitas: Chords Scales
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Lesson PackÔºö$5.99 ‚Üí $4.99 [$4.99 ~ $5.99]

Application Description

Learn Guitar. Guitar Chords & Scales Libraries, Lessons, Backing Tracks, Tuner, Metronome and much more. Guitar Gravitas is an inspirational tool for guitar players of all levels (beginner to pro) that offers the most comprehensive, advanced and interactive chord, arpeggio and scale library in the App Store. ‚Ä¢ Over 200 chord types including not only a library of 15,000 of the most commonly used chord shapes but also MILLIONS of playable shapes generated by a state-of-the-art algorithm that allows you to select the root note of the chord and also the lowest or highest note. ‚Ä¢ Thousands of arpeggios patterns generated on selection from a list of more than 200 chord types. ‚Ä¢ Over 1000 different scales from all over the world including thousands of patterns. ‚Ä¢ 31 videos with Guitar Lessons, Backing tracks, Tutorials and Support documents on PDF format. ‚Ä¢ High Precision Guitar Tuner. ‚Ä¢ Metronome. ‚Ä¢ More than 200 predefined guitar tunings and the possibility to create your own. ‚Ä¢ Interact to listen to how chords, arpeggios and scales sound. ‚Ä¢ :. Guitar Gravitas .: also comes with chord, arpeggio and scale finders where you can select notes on the fretboard and find out what what you are playing is called. ‚Ä¢ No matter what chord, arpeggio or scale you are checking out, :. Guitar Gravitas .: allows you to know what chords, arpeggios or scales you could combine it with. Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

entry.title: Wink: Video Enhancer & Editor
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Wink- AI Photo RestoreÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $2.99]

Application Description

Wink l Make any low-quality video & photo into HD/Ultra HD/4K with before/after comparisons. l Making video editing easier than ever! l Various creative video transition effects enhance final results! l Fine-tune your selfies with video retouch tools to highlight your day! Video ÔºÜ Photo Enhance - Video Enhancer: Enhance portraits and selfies to stunning output. - 4K Upscaler: AI-powered 4K upscaling for enhanced video quality. - Stabilize: Smooth out shaky footage for professional-looking videos. - Noise reduction: Reduce video noise and grain for professional-looking results. - AI Color: Give your video a vibrant, fresh look with our easy-to-use color enhancement tool Video Retouch - Manual Face Slimming: Adjust your facial features as you wish - Body Shape: Achieve a supermodel physique! - Stylish Makeup: Providing a range of natural makeup - Face Editor: Remove acne, Face Plump, Skin tone ... and more! - Whiten Teeth: Say goodbye to brown teeth and show off your smile! Video Editing - Professional Editing: Color, Crop, Speed, Split, Mirror, Soundtrack and more! - Templates: Easily apply to create high-quality vlogs - Quality Restoration: Clear AI-enhanced video restoration! - Effects: Adds texts, stickers, and transitions to enhance your videos - Automatic Subtitle: Utilizes intelligent voice recognition for easy text inputting AI Captions - Accurate AI subtitles for your videos in seconds - Support Bilingual: Create dual-language subtitles for your videos - Support 8 languages Wink VIP - Access exclusive VIP features Wink offers a wide range of exclusive VIP features to enhance retouching experience. We are committed to providing you with an improved service. We look forward to your continuing support. - Subscriptions Wink VIP-Monthly Subscription offers a subscription period of one month. Wink VIP-Annual subscription entails a 12-month period. *The subscription price is determined based on the information provided in the in-app purchase (iAP) application. - Instructions for Payment and Cancellation "Payment" will be credited to your iTunes account once you have confirmed and paid for your subscription. "Renewal" subscriptions for "Monthly/Annual" plans are automatically renewed and will incur charges to your iTunes account following your purchase confirmation. The subscription will be automatically renewed. To cancel it, please disable the automatic renewal at least 24 hours before the subscription period ends. Within 24 hours before the subscription cycle expires, Apple will automatically debit your iTunes account, extending your subscription for a new cycle. "To cancel your subscription, kindly navigate to the "Settings" section on your iPhone, click on "Apple ID," proceed to the "Subscription" screen, and choose "Wink" to terminate your subscription. - Agreement Terms of ServiceÔºöhttps://pro.meitu.com/wink-cut/agreements/common/service-global.html?lang=en Privacy PolicyÔºöhttps://pro.meitu.com/wink-cut/agreements/common/policy-global.html?lang=en

entry.title: VOX: MP3 & FLAC Music Player
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • LOOP for VOX SubscriptionÔºö$109.99 ‚Üí $49.99 [$49.99 ~ $109.99]

Application Description

#1 Hi-Res audio player for Mac & iPhone. Music just sounds better! *NEW* Introducing VOX Premium ‚Äì Your Ultimate Music Experience. VOX Premium adds a stunning cloud streaming features and unlimited music storage without a decline in quality. Sync, stream and cache your entire music library on Mac and iPhone in a way that suits you best! Listen to your music regardless of the format: ‚Ä¢ Play numerous lossy and lossless (FLAC, APE, WAV, DSD, etc.) audio formats; ‚Ä¢ Export playlists in various formats (PLS, M3U, XSPF); ‚Ä¢ Open different playlist types including M3U, PLS, XSPF, and the popular CUE format used to store CD rips; ‚Ä¢ Play audio files stored on NAS devices and other network drives. Manage your music easily:¬† ‚Ä¢ Control the player from the main interface, Dock context menu or main menu controls; ‚Ä¢ Automatically search for all the missing album artwork from MusicBrainz and Last.fm databases; ‚Ä¢ Use keyboard media keys, headphones controls, and Apple Remote to control the playback (requires VOX Preference Pane); ‚Ä¢ Easily add music via smart drop zones, open dialog and Finder context menu; ‚Ä¢ Use the Equalizer with presets & custom mode, crossfade, fade on play/pause, converting music to 5.1 or 7.1 format; ‚Ä¢ Preview album artwork from your Dock icon; ‚Ä¢ Gapless playback support; ‚Ä¢ Get system or Growl playback notifications. Focus on music, not the source:¬† ‚Ä¢ Work with different audio sources including custom Playlists, iTunes Library, online radio and much more; ‚Ä¢ Scrobble to Last.fm to keep your listening stats up-to-date; ‚Ä¢ Play any song, any playlist you find on YouTube via VOX FLAC Player, put all your YouTube songs into one media collection. Full SoundCloud integration: ‚Ä¢ Easily control SoundCloud via VOX; ‚Ä¢ Access the largest music database in the world and discover new tunes; ‚Ä¢ Bring your SoundCloud stream and likes directly into VOX. YouTube source: ‚Ä¢ Press CMD+U and paste any link from YouTube to play it in VOX. You can add it to VOX collections as well. Last.fm: ‚Ä¢ Scrobbling for your music stream; Radio access for VOX Premium subscribers (**NEW**): ‚Ä¢ 30'000+ Radio stations categorized by genres and countries!¬† Equip yourself with all of the audiophile tools of VOX Premium: ‚Ä¢ Advanced Audio Features: HOG Mode; Improved multi-output device support; ‚Ä¢ Convert stereophonic audio in your headphones to binaural using Bauer DSP (BS2B) technology; ‚Ä¢ Automatically Pause playback on headphones disconnection; ‚Ä¢ Take full advantage of AirPlay (10.8+) to listen with any of your wireless output devices. ‚Ä¢ VOX also supports SONOS wireless speakers systems. The beauty of VOX Player is in its simplicity, yet behind the minimal exterior lies a powerful Music Player with a ton of features and support for all audio formats you may ever need.¬† ‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì VOX Premium is available by auto-renewable subscriptions: - $4.99 per month; - $49.99 per year. Your credit card will be charged through your iTunes Account after the purchase confirmation. Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.¬† Your subscriptions can be managed in your iTunes Account Settings after purchase is made. entry.title: TextSniper - OCR, Copy & Paste
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$11.99 ‚Üí $9.99 [$7.99 ~ $11.99]Ôºâ

Application Description

TextSniper is an easy-to-use desktop Mac OCR app that can extract and recognize any non-searchable and non-editable text on your Mac's screen. As an extra feature, it can turn OCR text into speech. It is a super convenient alternative to complicated optical character recognition tools. The tool is intuitive to use and makes extracting text from your images, scanned paper documents, PDFs, or even videos easy. No training or special skills are required, and it fits perfectly home and business Mac users. Easily accessible from the menu bar whenever you need it and has a simple user interface. If you have used a built-in Mac screen capture application before, it wouldn't be any trouble to work with TextSniper, too. Select with a mouse any part of an image, photo, PDF document, or anything on your screen, and the app will process and recognize any text within this selection. The text output will be saved into a clipboard so you can paste it into your favourite macOS text editing or note-taking software. Finally, the app's optical character recognition engine doesn't need an internet connection to process documents. Great OCR solution for those who are concerned about privacy. The application does not collect any users' data. Use Cases: ‚Ä¢ Convert different image formats to text (JPEG, PNG, GIF, TIFF, BMP, etc.). ‚Ä¢ Pull text from a non-searchable PDF file without a need to process the whole document. ‚Ä¢ Read text from images, PDF documents, photos, Zoom meetings, or any other sources. ‚Ä¢ Copy text even when it is uncopiable, like in ebooks or web articles. ‚Ä¢ Quickly extract emails, links, phone numbers, etc. ‚Ä¢ Grab text or turn it into speech in video games. ‚Ä¢ Read QR or barcodes. ‚Ä¢ Quickly generate alt text from the screenshot for tweets. Features: ‚Ä¢ On-device OCR technology. No internet connection is needed. ‚Ä¢ Instant text recognition. No need to upload files into the application. OCR document or file on the fly. ‚Ä¢ High accuracy and performance in processing any documents. ‚Ä¢ Recognizes even tiny text on images with low-quality or dense background. ‚Ä¢ Customizable. Custom keyboard shortcuts to extract text with various options. ‚Ä¢ You can have TextSniper speak the recognized text whenever you need it. ‚Ä¢ Supports optical character recognition in multiple languages: English, Spanish, French, German, Portuguese, Italian, Traditional and Simplified Chinese. ‚Ä¢ Running macOS Ventura: All the above languages plus Ukrainian, Korean, Japanese and Russian. ‚Ä¢ Running macOS Sonoma: All the above languages plus Thai and Vietnamese. ‚Ä¢ Running macOS Sequoia: All the above languages plus Arabic and Najdi Arabic. ‚Ä¢ Running macOS Catalina: English language only supported. ‚Ä¢ Use your iPad or iPhone camera to capture text from a photo or scanned document quickly. ‚Ä¢ Fully compatible with macOS Sonoma and optimised for Apple's M1-M3 chips.

entry.title: Wink: Video Enhancer & Editor
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Wink- AI Photo RestoreÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $2.99]

Application Description

Wink l Make any low-quality video & photo into HD/Ultra HD/4K with before/after comparisons. l Making video editing easier than ever! l Various creative video transition effects enhance final results! l Fine-tune your selfies with video retouch tools to highlight your day! Video ÔºÜ Photo Enhance - Video Enhancer: Enhance portraits and selfies to stunning output. - 4K Upscaler: AI-powered 4K upscaling for enhanced video quality. - Stabilize: Smooth out shaky footage for professional-looking videos. - Noise reduction: Reduce video noise and grain for professional-looking results. - AI Color: Give your video a vibrant, fresh look with our easy-to-use color enhancement tool Video Retouch - Manual Face Slimming: Adjust your facial features as you wish - Body Shape: Achieve a supermodel physique! - Stylish Makeup: Providing a range of natural makeup - Face Editor: Remove acne, Face Plump, Skin tone ... and more! - Whiten Teeth: Say goodbye to brown teeth and show off your smile! Video Editing - Professional Editing: Color, Crop, Speed, Split, Mirror, Soundtrack and more! - Templates: Easily apply to create high-quality vlogs - Quality Restoration: Clear AI-enhanced video restoration! - Effects: Adds texts, stickers, and transitions to enhance your videos - Automatic Subtitle: Utilizes intelligent voice recognition for easy text inputting AI Captions - Accurate AI subtitles for your videos in seconds - Support Bilingual: Create dual-language subtitles for your videos - Support 8 languages Wink VIP - Access exclusive VIP features Wink offers a wide range of exclusive VIP features to enhance retouching experience. We are committed to providing you with an improved service. We look forward to your continuing support. - Subscriptions Wink VIP-Monthly Subscription offers a subscription period of one month. Wink VIP-Annual subscription entails a 12-month period. *The subscription price is determined based on the information provided in the in-app purchase (iAP) application. - Instructions for Payment and Cancellation "Payment" will be credited to your iTunes account once you have confirmed and paid for your subscription. "Renewal" subscriptions for "Monthly/Annual" plans are automatically renewed and will incur charges to your iTunes account following your purchase confirmation. The subscription will be automatically renewed. To cancel it, please disable the automatic renewal at least 24 hours before the subscription period ends. Within 24 hours before the subscription cycle expires, Apple will automatically debit your iTunes account, extending your subscription for a new cycle. "To cancel your subscription, kindly navigate to the "Settings" section on your iPhone, click on "Apple ID," proceed to the "Subscription" screen, and choose "Wink" to terminate your subscription. - Agreement Terms of ServiceÔºöhttps://pro.meitu.com/wink-cut/agreements/common/service-global.html?lang=en Privacy PolicyÔºöhttps://pro.meitu.com/wink-cut/agreements/common/policy-global.html?lang=en

entry.title: Audio Editor & Music Mixer
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Permanent membershipÔºö$11.99 ‚Üí $9.99 [$9.99 ~ $14.99]

Application Description

Want to make your own unique phone ringtones? Or want to combine multiple songs and synthesize the music you want? Or want to know the effect of mixing different songs? Audio Editor & Music Mixer is an easy to operate music cutting and mixing tool. Simple and excellent, functional and practical! Whether you are a professional musician or music amateur, you can play easily. Features: 1.Professional ringtone clip: free to edit, the maximum clipping of the ringtone is 40s (in line with the characteristics of ringtones) 2.Simple music stitching: song editing and splicing as a whole,connect the favorite songs 3.Unique music mixing: free to cut the two songs, mixed together to play, feel different music effects! Subscription instrutionsÔºö - After you subscribe to the VIP, you have unlimited access to all features - Subscribe to provide 4 types of VIP services, including: weekly VIP service, monthly VIP service, yearly VIP service, permanent VIP service - Subscribe to $2.49 per week, $4.49 per month, $13.49 for 1 year and $14.99 for permanent - The purchase process is to deduct the purchase amount from the iTunes account - Account will be charged at the cost of the selected package within 24 hours prior to the current period - Cancellation of current subscription is not allowed during active subscription period.But you can cancel next subscription. - You can access our privacy policy by visiting (long press) https://www.camoryapps.com/netpower/privacy_policy/musicmixer_en.html - You can access (long press) https://www.camoryapps.com/netpower/service/musicmixer_en.html to read the Terms of Service *The price is equivalent to the 'Apple App Store Matrix' which is equivalent to the subscription price in US dollars.
